info.title: APK APIs
info.description: All backend APIs bundle to support admin and mobile functions

parameters.name: taskList
parameters.description: Do we want to skip taskList?

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique ID of task, not taskId but id

parameters.name: clientCode
parameters.description: Client Code, like default is INNO

userId.description: User Id for which password needs to be reset

textValue.description: Entered text value for the task

numberValue.description: Numeric value input for the task

userId.description: Unique identifier of the user submitting the update

submittedAt.description: Timestamp when the task was submitted in UTC

placeName.description: Name of the place ie fetched from lat/lng
